content: finished size 22cm/8 5in - nose to tail needles pair 3 50mm/ size 4 needles plus one spare * and pair 3 75mm/ size 5 needles yarn i used two shades yarn held together in these shades you ll need less than half a ball of each a brown 4-ply drops alpaca shade 0617 b beige 4-ply drops alpaca shade 0618 c off-white 4-ply rowan alpaca classic shade 00115 d off-white boucle drops boucle shade 0100 e pink mohair drops kid-silk shade 03 gauge 15 row and 11 stitches over 5cm eyes pair 8mm grey toy eyes with plastic backs - however if the toy is intended for a very young child then please stay safe and embroider french knot eyes instead extra heavy-weight toy filling length dark brown 4-py yarn for the nose and hoof detail begin at the nose using 3 50mm/ size 4 needles and with yarns a & b brown 4-ply and beige 4-ply held together cast on 7 sts row 1 increase kfb k to last st kfb 9sts row 2 p row 3-6 increase repeat last 2 row twice - 13sts row 7 increase kfb k4 kfb k1 kfb k to last st kfb 17sts row 8 p cut yarn a brown join on yarn c off-white 4-ply cont with 2 yarns as foll row 9 increase kfb k5 kfb k3 kfb k to last st kfb 21sts lamb row 10 & 12 p knitting pattern by claire garland row 11 increase k7 kfb k5 kfb k to end - 23sts lamb page 2 lamb page 3 cut yarn b beige join on yarn d boucle cont with 2 yarns as foll head back row 13 increase k8 kfb k5 kfb turn to work on forehead as foll row 19 k across 6 sts from lamb s left side rejoin forehead sts to a forehead knitting needle with rs ready to knit across k across 13 forehead sts row 14 p9 turn rejoin 8 right side sts to a knitting needle with rs ready to knit across k row 15 increase k1 kfb k5 kfb k1 turn 11 forehead sts across 6 right side sts 25sts row 16 p11 turn row 20 p row 17 increase k2 kfb k5 kfb k2 turn 13 forehead sts row 21 decrease cast off 4 sts these are your head back seam sts k4 row 18-20 beg with a p row work 3 row st st turn cast on cable cast-on 5sts 10 ears sts either slip the remaining cut yarns and leave sts on a large safety pin for now 16 sts onto a stitch holder or work the foll left ear sts on a spare needle * right side cut yarn d boucle join on yarn b beige 4-ply cont with 2 yarns as return to the 8 sts on lamb s right side with yarns c & d off-white foll 4-ply and boucle and 3 50mm smaller needles cont as foll left ear row 13
